summary.span: 在 控制項中實作可選取的項目。

span.span: Implements a selectable item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示其標頭和物件的集合可以是任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 控制項可以內嵌在其他若要建立的階層節點內的控制項控制項。 controls can be embedded inside other controls to create a hierarchy of nodes inside a control. 下圖顯示階層內的控制項。The following illustration shows a hierarchy of controls inside a . ![TreeView 圖例](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 圖例")![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") 若要展開或摺疊，使用屬性。To expand or collapse a , use the property. 如需詳細資訊控制項，請參閱[TreeView 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md)。For more information about the control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md). ## 自訂 TreeViewItem 控制項Customizing the TreeViewItem Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [TreeView 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立階層中的控制項控制項。The following example shows how to create a hierarchy of controls in a control. summary.span: 提供 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for a event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果滑鼠是兩個，值屬性會切換成`true`或是`false`，會造成展開或摺疊。If the mouse is two, the value of the property switches to `true` or `false`, which causes the to expand or collapse. 此實作會將標示事件，為已處理，藉由設定屬性的事件資料，以`true`。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

para.span: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作，您實作。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 無法呼叫基底實作，可避免基底類別處理可能會變更執行階段行為的最後一個類別的類別處理常式的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
